bug.author: samuelthan
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: Installed vanilla kubeflow version 0.5.1 on AWS EKS. After successfull installation of 0.5.1, attempt upgrade to 0.6.1 referencing <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/other-guides/upgrade/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/other-guides/upgrade/</denchmark-link>
Downloaded new version via curl -OL https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/releases/download/v0.6.1/kfctl_v0.6.1_darwin.tar.gz `export PATH=$PATH:/Users/username/tools/kubeflow/0.6.1 export KUBEFLOW_VERSION=v0.6.1 export KFAPP=kfapp kfctl init ${KFAPP} --version=${KUBEFLOW_VERSION} --package-manager=kustomize@${KUBEFLOW_VERSION} cd ${KFAPP} kfctl generate all -V` The above execute without problem. The following step returns a bunch of errors: kfctl apply all -V Error recieved: `NFO[0000] Downloading /tmp/kubeflow-aws/kfapp/app.yaml to /var/folders/s5/qfb6dpnj3yq57jr23kdgq5nj4pxscs/T/078119267/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:334" INFO[0000] Writing stripped KfDef to /tmp/kubeflow-aws/kfapp/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:626" INFO[0000] Downloading /tmp/kubeflow-aws/kfapp/app.yaml to /var/folders/s5/qfb6dpnj3yq57jr23kdgq5nj4pxscs/T/099988838/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:334" INFO[0000] Initializing a default restConfig for Kubernetes filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:248" WARN[0000] could not open /Users/USERNAME/.kube/kubeconfig_ai-eks-cluster:/Users/USERNAME/.kube/kube-config-eks Error stat /Users/USERNAME/.kube/kubeconfig_ai-eks-cluster:/Users/USERNAME/.kube/kube-config-eks: no such file or directory filename="apps/group.go:234" panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference [signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x0 pc=0x5db16c1] goroutine 1 [running]: k8s.io/client-go/v2/kubernetes.NewForConfig(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0) /tmp/v2/k8s.io/client-go/kubernetes/clientset.go:447 +0x51 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/v2/pkg/apis/apps.GetClientset(0x0, 0x0) /Users/zhenghui/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/v2/pkg/apis/apps/group.go:262 +0x5d github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/v2/pkg/kfapp/kustomize.(*kustomize).Apply(0xc0002bcb40, 0x652c70a, 0x3, 0x0, 0x0) /Users/zhenghui/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/v2/pkg/kfapp/kustomize/kustomize.go:263 +0x234 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator.(*coordinator).Apply.func2(0x0, 0x0) /Users/zhenghui/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator/coordinator.go:749 +0x12e github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator.(*coordinator).Apply(0xc000512040, 0x652c626, 0x3, 0x0, 0x0) /Users/zhenghui/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator/coordinator.go:782 +0x229 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd.glob..func1(0x7d13ba0, 0xc000547ba0, 0x1, 0x2, 0x0, 0x0) /Users/zhenghui/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd/apply.go:46 +0x4cb github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute(0x7d13ba0, 0xc000547b80, 0x2, 0x2, 0x0, 0x0) /Users/zhenghui/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.3/command.go:762 +0xb4a github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC(0x7d13e00, 0x7d13ba0, 0x0, 0x0) /Users/zhenghui/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.3/command.go:852 +0x6bb github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute(0x7d13e00, 0x0, 0x0) /Users/zhenghui/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.3/command.go:800 +0x3b github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd.Execute(0x695cc10, 0x17) /Users/zhenghui/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd/root.go:61 +0x6d main.main() /Users/zhenghui/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/main.go:36 +0x39 ` What did you expect to happen: Upgrade to complete Anything else you would like to add: Environment:
kfctl version: kfctl v0.6.1-rc.2-1-g3a37cbc6 Kubernetes platform: AWS EKS Kubernetes version: Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.1", GitCommit:"4485c6f18cee9a5d3c3b4e523bd27972b1b53892", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-07-18T14:25:20Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.7", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"} OS: MacOS X

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.98. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

Discovered that the issue is at my bash profile end. My bash profile had this export KUBECONFIG=/Users/USERNAME/.kube/kubeconfig_ai-eks-cluster:/Users/USERNAME/.kube/kube-config-eks After cleaning it up to look like this export KUBECONFIG=/Users/USERNAME/.kube/kubeconfig_ai-eks-cluster I
